text: Ate amasavu bwe gaabanga tegannayokebwa, omuweereza wa kabona yajjanga n’agamba omuntu awaayo ssaddaaka nti, “Kabona muwe ku nnyama ayokye, kubanga tajja kukkiriza kutwala nnyama nfumbe ayagala mbisi yokka2:15 Etteeka lyaweebwa ng’amasavu n’ennyama ensava byali byakwokeeranga ku kyoto (Lv 3:16; 4:8-10)..”
